Nerangs.ab: āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca ka xšnūman srōš bēd ēdōn abāyēd guftan ī mān nibišt agar xšnūman srōš nē bēd ān ī bēd guftan bōy ō ī ātaxš dādan

"āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe yasnāica vaɱāica xšnaōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca. When the šnūman is for Srōš, they must recite so as we have written. If the šnūman is not for Srōš, they have to recite the corresponding one. He has to bring bōy to the fire."
